doc.title: Dreg
doc.plot: Louisiana, 1940. Madness thrives in the Pointe au Chien and a dark legacy is embraced. A bayou boy is baptized in city blood and a pack as old as time rises from the swamps. A man beast escapes his shackles, and the hunt begins. A hunt that will last for decades. A hunt fueled by the moon. For when the moon is full, the beast rises... and the blood flows.
